snippet: The hip-hop moguls met with Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to press for changes in the way the criminal justice system handles cases of alleged police brutality.
abstract: Hip-hop moguls Jay Z and Russell Simmons meet with New York Gov Andrew Cuomo to press for changes to state's criminal justice system amid protests over lack of indictments in recent police shootings.
lead_paragraph: The hip-hop moguls met with Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo to press for changes in the way the criminal justice system handles cases of alleged police brutality.

headline.main: Jay Z and Russell Simmons Seek Justice Reforms
